snippet.title: FAR: Lone Sails – PS4 & Xbox One Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Travel across a dried-out ocean in the award-winning indie game FAR: Lone Sails – out now on the PlayStation Store and Microsoft Store! Get the game for PS4: https://store.playstation.com/?resolve=UP3178-CUSA14846_00-0000000000000000
  // Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/far-lone-sails/9p5x7892qpdl 

FAR: Lone Sails is a vehicle adventure game. In a unique vehicle you travel across a ocean-turned-desert following the tracks of a once thriving civilization. Through an array of roadblocks and through hazardous weather you need to keep your vessel going. Where will this journey take you? Are you the last of your kind?
 
What once was the bottom of an ocean, has turned into a graveyard for submarines and super tankers. Once bustling island settlements have decayed into hilltop ruins. What secrets do they hold? And more importantly… is there any salvage to be found?!
 
While the greater goal of the journey remains to be uncovered by the player, urgent short-term necessities call for immediate action. The train-like vehicle needs to be fueled, maintained and upgraded to master the challenges that lie ahead…
 
https://www.far-game.com

#FARLoneSails #indiegames
